Welcome to Qubea London

Your Ultimate Beauty Destination!

Discover a world of beauty and relaxation where every detail is tailored to enhance your natural allure. Our salon specializes in nail and pedicure services, eyelash extensions, eyebrow lamination, hair styling, and makeup, ensuring you radiate confidence and charm.

  • Safety First

    We prioritize your well-being by employing medical sterilization using specialized autoclaves. Your safety is our top priority. Rest assured, your well-being is at the forefront of everything we do, providing you with the peace of mind you deserve.

  • Expert Craftsmanship:

    Our team of seasoned specialists isn't just here to perform procedures – they're here to guide you. With their wealth of experience, they'll suggest the best options to accentuate your beauty, ensuring your experience is both pampering and informative.

  • Efficiency Meets Luxury

    We understand the hustle and bustle of city life. That's why we offer our exclusive 4 Hands Service, allowing you to enjoy multiple treatments simultaneously, making the most of your valuable time.

  • Long-Lasting Beauty

    For enduring results, our aftercare recommendations ensure your lashes and brows remain stunning long after your treatments.

  • Trendsetters' Paradise

    At Qubea London, we're always at the forefront of trends. Discover the latest materials and popular nail polish palettes that reflect the most current styles.

  • Customer-Centric Approach

    Our commitment to you doesn't end after your visit. Our dedicated Customer Care Manager is always available to address your feedback and suggestions.

  • Serene Oasis

    Your comfort is paramount. Our serene atmosphere and friendly administrator await to offer you a cup of tea, coffee, or a glass of Prosecco to elevate your mood.

Join us
at Qubea London

Here is
the place where beauty meets expertise, trends meet tradition, and relaxation meets rejuvenation
